ygData.subject: RE: Time for another Sylly Survey
ygData.msgSnippet: ... before this thread. ... Steve.  X-Files for me. ... Shada
ygData.messageBody:
> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
> As we all know, the right atmosphere is required for total
> immersion into
> character so...
>
> When playing your bard in Norrath what is your favorite:
>
> Day of the week to play: Monday
>
> Time of day: 6am when baby wakes me up.
>
> Longest stretch of continuous play: 20 hours took shifts with wife.
>
> Way to have game sounds: low
>
> Distance to sit from display: 1-2ft, thought my 19" monitor was big
before this thread.
>
> TV show to have on: Blue's Clues, baby loves it and wife says i look like
Steve. X-Files for me.
>
> Music to listen to: whatever's on TV
>
> Beverage (non-alcoholic): Water, Milk, Diet Coke
>
> Beverage (alcoholic): Rolling Rock
>
> Health Food: everything, i'm a vegetarian.
>
> Junk Food: nothing, sob.
>
> Clothes to wear: Boxers of course
>
Shada
